code: import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import ReactDOM from'react-dom';import'./styles.css';import{cart}from'../bagcontext';import{CreateProducts}from'../products';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{bag}from'../../App';import border from'../img/border.png';import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductSearch(){var navigate=useNavigate();var selectedProduct=useContext(bag);selectedProduct.length=0;var cartItems=useContext(cart);useEffect(function(){if(cartItems.length>0){document.getElementById('bag-counter').style.display='block';}});function goToBag(){navigate('/shopping-cart');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"bag-counter",children:"!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"bag-popup",src:"../img/shoppingcart.svg",onClick:goToBag}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"title-img",src:border,alt:"border image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"main-title",className:"title"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"body-cont",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{id:"products",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateProducts,{})})})})]});}export default ProductSearch;
